title: Convict's Code (1939 Film Noir) Directed by Lambert Hillyer | TO KILL! OR BE KILLED!

sources.title: Convict's Code (1939 Film Noir) Directed by Lambert Hillyer | TO KILL! OR BE KILLED!
sources.description:
Dave Tyler (Robert Kent), freshly paroled but framed, dives headfirst into a high-stakes game of cat and mouse to expose the real crooks, all while juggling a risky romance with Julie Warren (Anne Nagel), whose brother Gregory (Sidney Blackmer) might just be the mastermind behind the setup. With every step, Tyler walks a tightrope between freedom and a return to the shadows, proving that sometimes the toughest battles are fought outside the cage.

Alternative title: Paroled to Exile (1939)
Colorized version:  https://youtu.be/DsNOLXh9McU


Director: Lambert Hillyer
Writer: John W. Krafft
Actors: Robert Kent, Anne Nagel, Sidney Blackmer

Genres: Crime, Drama, Film-Noir
Release date: January 18, 1939
Filming location: Malibu lake
